title: I had a friend create this, and I thought it was perfect.
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/276466020036640768/284182367739052033/Jhin_by_Cale.png
I thought this was perfect perfect perfect perfect.
also, I don't know if it will put a link or the actual picture, I put the thing in the body and the link.

replies.body: thanks, we thought it was pretty funny, he drew it himself. Imma go look for his other drawings.

He posted this, and I am 90% sure he drew this (he is an ivern mian)
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/276466020036640768/282292996534304770/15-Ivern.png

That's actually the WIP splash art for Ivern from the Feeney art gallery.

Here's the link:
[http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/02/before-theres-splash-art-theres-feeney-art/]
